comments.author: Cliff Spradlin.3512
comments.body:
Those are currently the supported languages.

I’ve updated the documentation to reflect this.

comments.author: Fror.2163
comments.body:
What are the supported languages for the queries allowing lang as parameter?

I suppose these are “en”, “de”, “fr” and “es”, but if there are more, a complete list of supported languages would be welcome.
